files.README.md:
# skills
AI skills for Shiny Libraries

plugins.name: shiny-mediator
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny Mediator - code generation, documentation, and scaffolding for .NET mediator pattern implementation

plugins.name: shiny-maui-shell
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny MAUI Shell - code generation, documentation, and scaffolding for .NET MAUI Shell applications

plugins.name: shiny-reflector
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny Reflector - source-generated reflection for .NET with AOT support, JSON serialization, and assembly info generation

plugins.name: shiny-extensions
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny Extensions - attribute-driven DI registration, cross-platform key/value stores, and ASP.NET infrastructure modules

plugins.name: localizegen
plugins.description: Claude Code plugin for Shiny Localization Generator - strongly-typed localization class generation from .resx files for .NET applications
